channel.title: [PI] 99 in a skill interface [PI] rep++
channel.description:
you know the interface that used to come up in the chatbox when you got a 99? It would say "congratulations you are now a master in the whatever skill!" etc etc.
This is what i mean: [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/vxkf89.png[/img]
I want to add this to my PI source, so whenever someone gets a 99, it does that. I couldnt find any tutorials on this. If someoen can help me out, or direct me to a tutorial, id appreciate it. Thanks. Ill rep++ who helps me figure this out.
